types.html:
ôter les mots de la bouche

  1. to take the words out of (someone's) mouth (to say what someone was about to say themselves) [with à ‘someone’]
    Synonyms: enlever les mots de la bouche, arracher les mots de la bouche
    Tu m'as ôté les mots de la bouche ! ― You took the words out of my mouth!
